203b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
203b4('bum): cing / sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can le lo can brtson
203b5('bum): 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
203b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/ tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/ bzod pa'i rkyen
203b7('bum): tam/ brtson 'grus kyi rkyen tam/ bsam gtan gyi rkyen tam/ shes rab kyi rkyen tam/ gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'gras brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas
204a1('bum): bsgrub par byas/ brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/ sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing
204a2('bum): lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis
204a3('bum): 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// de dag bsgoms rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// phyir mi 'ong ba'i
204a4('bum): 'bras bu thob po// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// rang byang chub thob po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
204a5('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo// gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// brtson 'grus kyi legs
204a6('bum): pa brjod do// sems can gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/
204a7('bum): sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar cing / brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/ rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na
204b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//
204b2('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin
204b3('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir
204b4('bum): bsam gtan la mnyam par mi 'dzeg ces brjod de de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can de dag
204b5('bum): la 'di skad du 'dems te/ kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/ byang
204b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/ rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrubs te/ de'i
204b7('bum): phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gsum pa la
205a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go
205a2('bum): dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go/ btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/ de dag bsam gtan
205a3('bum): dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi
205a4('bum): sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
205a5('bum): pa sgom mo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo// de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de la la la ni bla na med pa
205a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205a7('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa
205b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ 'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i
205b3('bum): phyir shes rab mi skem zhes brjod de/ de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205b4('bum): la gnas shing / sems can de dag la 'di skad du 'dems te/ nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig/ tshul khrims srungs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig
205b5('bum): brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig/ rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa la bdag gam/
205b6('bum): sems can nam/ srog gam/ 'gro ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed can nam/ shed bdag gam/ byed pa po 'am tshor ba po 'am/
205b7('bum): shes pa po 'am/ mthong ba po 'am/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams sam/
206a1('bum): gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
206a2('bum): pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'am/
206a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas
206a4('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/
206a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
206a6('bum): dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
206a7('bum): rkang pa rnams mam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags
206b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams
206b2('bum): sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par she
206b3('bum): pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang
206b4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/
206b5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med
206b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos gang yang yod dam/ rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
206b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la dmigs pas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de la mngon par zhen
207a1('bum): pa med pas/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong stong ste/
207a2('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha ma yin gyi
207a3('bum): ris su gtogs pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni mi'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni
207a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o// 'di ni de
207a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
207a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
207b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams/ dran pa nye
207b2('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
207b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
207b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
207b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par
207b6('bum): spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b7('bum): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
208a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/
208a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems
208a3('bum): can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem
208a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
208a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la
208a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
208a7('bum): dbang po lnga bsgom mo// dbang po lnga sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
208b1('bum): po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
208b3('bum): sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las
208b4('bum): yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams
208b5('bum): sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems
208b6('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis
208b7('bum): yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/
209a1('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
209a2('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
209a3('bum): brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs ste/ yo byad de dag gis
209a4('bum): yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs
209a5('bum): su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
209a6('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
209a7('bum): bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag
209b1('bum): gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de/
209b2('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor
209b3('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab
209b4('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnam par bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag
209b5('bum): par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
209b6('bum): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
209b7('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'/
210a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgra
210a2('bum): mo/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
210a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
210a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la
210a5('bum): yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar
210a6('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no//
210a7('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
210b1('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom/
210b2('bum): mo// stobs lnga sgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
210b3('bum): gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
210b4('bum): shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag yo byad rnams nye bar
210b5('bum): sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar
210b6('bum): par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnam
210b7('bum): sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
211a1('bum): sems can rnams sbyar ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la so byad rnams na par bzla
211a2('bum): te/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas 'khor ba las

211a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems
211b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la semasas can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
211b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/

213b7('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
214a1('bum): shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

215a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
215a4('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub
215a5('bum): kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
215a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
215a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btsun 'grus kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyar/
215b1('bum): ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems

215b4('bum): rnams la sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar
215b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/
215b6('bum): yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las
215b7('bum): yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar
216a1('bum): gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
216a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
216a3('bum): can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms
216a4('bum): pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang
216a5('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
216a6('bum): shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams
216a7('bum): nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba las
216b1('bum): yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
216b2('bum): la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la
216b3('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag
216b4('bum): gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang
216b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar
216b6('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
216b7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
217a1('bum): stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
217a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
217a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
217a4('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams
217a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
217a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor
217a7('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnam
217b1('bum): sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin
217b2('bum): pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar
217b3('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
217b4('bum): brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran
217b5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas
217b6('bum): shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo// dran
217b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
218a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
218a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
218a3('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag
218a4('bum): gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par
218a5('bum): gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems
218a6('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
218a7('bum): bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems
218b1('bum): can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
218b2('bum): bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas shing /
218b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
218b4('bum): dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems
218b5('bum): can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las
218b6('bum): yongs su thar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can
218b7('bum): rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams
219a1('bum): sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing //
219a2('bum): sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga bsgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba
219a3('bum): las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can
219a4('bum): rnams sbyor yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
219a5('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo
219a6('bum): byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/
219a7('bum): 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi
219b1('bum): yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags
219b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
219b3('bum): gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo//
219b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
219b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no//
219b6('bum): / bam po bcu gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
219b7('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can 'gon med pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ khabs dang / zhes kyis 'phangs pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar/
220a1('bum): yongs su smin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed tshur sheg/ nga las zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang /
220a2('bum): mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang dang / bai DUr+ya dang /
220a3('bum): dung dang / ma na shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ji rung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thog
220a4('bum): shig de ni khyed la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar don 'di ni pha'i yin gyi/ bdag gi ma yin no snyam bsam par bya'o// don 'di na bdag
220a5('bum): gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no zhes de ltar khyed kyis bdag gi yin par soms la/ sems can rnams la yongs su thong shig/ sbyin
220a6('bum): pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig/ bzod pa la sbyor cig/ brtson 'grus la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan la sbyor cig/ shes rab la sbyor cig/ nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/
220a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ chen po stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/
220b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ thog ma dang tha mi stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/
220b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ mi
220b3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dran pa nye
220b4('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor cig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor cig/ dbang po rnams la sbyor cig stobs rnams la sbyor
220b5('bum): cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor cig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan rnams
220b6('bum): la sbyor cig/ tshad med pa rnams la sbyor cig/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor cig/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor cig/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
220b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la sbyor cig/ mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor cig
221a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyor cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyor cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor cig/ mi 'jigs pa
221a2('bum): bzhi la sbyor cig/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor cig/ snying rje chen po la sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sbyor cig/ de tsam gyis dga'
221a3('bum): bar ma sems par gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa rnams la khod cig/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
221a4('bum): 'bras bu la khod cig/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ dgra bcom pa nyid la khod cig/ rang byang chub la khod cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
221a5('bum): pa'i byang chub la khod cig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
221a6('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar pa nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las
221a7('bum): yongs su thar ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams 'di
221b1('bum): ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// rkyen gang ma ldan pas khyed tshul khrims ngan par byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang /
221b2('bum): bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUH
221b3('bum): dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang yang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan
221b4('bum): thogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa
221b5('bum): de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/ de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma zhig pa mgod pa ma 'dres pa/
221b6('bum): skyon med pa/ ma nyams pa/ rang dbang yod pa/ mkhas pas sngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyur gyur pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
221b7('bum): pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi
222a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang /
222a2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma
222a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin
222a4('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa
222a5('bum): nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba
222a6('bum): bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam
222a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i
222b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar par rnams la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
222b2('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/
222b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi
222b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
222b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can sems 'khrugs pa dang / gnod sems su gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen
222b6('bum): gang dang ma ldan pas khyed gnod sems su byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang /
222b7('bum): me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
223a1('bum): dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ji yang rung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas de
223a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag bzod pa sgom
223a3('bum): ste/ 'khrug pa med pa dang / gnod sems su med pa'i sems su gyur pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas//
223a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
223a5('bum): phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa
223a6('bum): nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/
223a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/
223b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
223b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/
223b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
223b4('bum): gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
223b5('bum): gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
223b6('bum): smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
223b7('bum): bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams pa
224a1('bum): gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a2('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang
224a3('bum): dang ma ldan pas/ khyed le lo byed par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang /
224a4('bum): bdug spos dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang /
224a5('bum): gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
224a6('bum): sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan pa de btags pas/ de dag brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus rtsom
224a7('bum): par gyur pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod
224b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan
224b2('bum): da ga na da/ dzinas na du
224b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang
224b4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi
224b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i
224b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la
224b7('bum): gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
225a1('bum): gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
225a2('bum): gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
225a3('bum): smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
225a4('bum): stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
225a5('bum): rnams la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
225a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can sems yengs par gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed
225a7('bum): sems yengs par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal chad/ me tog dang / gdug
225b1('bum): spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / babru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
225b2('bum): byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
225b3('bum): byin pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag sgom ste// sems g.yeng ba med cing
225b4('bum): mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
225b5('bum): gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
225b6('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas// nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa
225b7('bum): nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
226a1('bum): nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
226a2('bum): gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/
226a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/
226a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
226a5('bum): brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
226a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang //
226a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gsungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin
226b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
226b2('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
226b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams/ ngan song gsum las yod
226b4('bum): su thar pa nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226b5('bum): pa la gnas shing / sems can shes rab 'chal par gyur pa blo chung ba dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas/ khyed shes rab
226b6('bum): 'chal par gyur pa'i rkyen de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos
226b7('bum): dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
227a1('bum): mi'i rkyen dang / yo byad gang ji yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar long shig ces nas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
227a2('bum): sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ rmongs pa med cing shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag shes rab kyi pha
227a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gan shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
227a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la
227a5('bum): gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas
227a6('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin
227a7('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa
227b1('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba
227b2('bum): bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas/ 'phas
227b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs
227b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar
227b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo
227b6('bum): rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po
227b7('bum): la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na
228a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin/
228a2('bum): par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smin par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum las thar pa nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su thar ro// /
228a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu bdun pa'o// // de nas tshe dang
228a4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i go bgo bar bya na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
228a5('bum): po'i byang chub kyi lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi sems kyis yongasu rtog pa thugs su chud nas//
228a6('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo//
228a7('bum): rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub
228b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab
228b2('bum): 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
228b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni byang
228b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor stong pa
228b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lamo// /
228b6('bum): rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
228b7('bum): po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byad
229a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
229a2('bum): chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub
229a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rang gi
229a4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
229a5('bum): chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub
229a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab
229a7('bum): 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
229b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa'
229b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub
229b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab
229b4('bum): 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
229b5('bum): chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor chad med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam mo// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
229b6('bum): bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab
229b7('bum): 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
230a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang/
230a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
230a3('bum): rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam/
230a4('bum): mo// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'
230a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
230a6('bum): brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo//
230a7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya ba dang / gang la ma bslabs kyang bla na med pa yang dag/
230b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab
230b2('bum): par mi bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang med de/ chos thams cad la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
230b3('bum): par mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
230b4('bum): thams cad la 'di ltar bslab par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba 'am/ 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// 'jig
230b5('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa med pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus ma
230b6('bum): byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go// so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos
230b7('bum): ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go// byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go//
231a1('bum): zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa 'phro bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te//
231a2('bum): chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos tham
231a3('bum): cad la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pas/ de'i phyir byang chub
231a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor
231a5('bum): khyod kyis gzhan gang yang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed do zhes bya ba 'am/ 'di dag
231a6('bum): go zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// zag pa med pa
231a7('bum): chos ni 'di dag go// 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go// 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go//
231b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go// phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ byang chub
231b2('bum): sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bya bar chos rnam par dbye bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag gis de
231b3('bum): ltar chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar shes sam/ gal te shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing / rnam pa
231b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/ rab 'byor sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar mi shes sam/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
231b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos rnam par dgod par byas shing / sems can rnams
231b6('bum): la chos ston to// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ mngon
231b7('bum): par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par/ 'di la chos gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med do zhes bya bar yongs su brtag par bya'o// de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de
232a1('bum): ltar rtog pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus
232a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gta gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/
232a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
232a4('bum): pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan
232a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/
232a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'am/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/ dbang po lnga 'am/ stobs lnga 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag
232a7('bum): bdun nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ tshad med pa bzhi 'am/ gzugs med pa'i
232b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'am/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
232b2('bum): dang smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi
232b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/
232b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang
232b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam// chos gang la yang mngon par chags par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ stong
232b6('bum): pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ gang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor
232b7('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par chos thams cad kyis rnam par spyod do// de bslab pa 'di la bslabs
233a1('bum): shing sems can 'di dag ci la spyod ces sems can gyi spyod pa le lta ste/ de 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
233a2('bum): 'dzin pa la spyod de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar bya na/ dka' ba byed do zhes nas de'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ shes rab
233a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di skad du ston to// kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sbyin pa byin cig/ des khyed long spyod dang ldan par 'gyur gyis/ long spyod des kyang
233a4('bum): rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du tshul khrims la 'dams te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tshul khrims srungs shig/ tshul khrim
233a5('bum): des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du bzod pa la yang 'dems shing / kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bzod pa sgoms shig
233a6('bum): bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du brtson 'grus la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag chur sheg/ brtson 'grus
233a7('bum): rtsoms shig/ brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la 'dems te kye sems can dag tshur sheg/
233b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog shig ga ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlos sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du shes rab la 'dems te/
233b2('bum): sems can dag tshur sheg shes rab bsgoms shig/ shes rab des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la
233b3('bum): 'dems shing / kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlob sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do//
233b4('bum): de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyi stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ phyi stong pa nyid des kyang rloms sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po
233b5('bum): gang yang med do// de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlom
233b6('bum): sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
233b7('bum): sgoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can
234a1('bum): \u0f7f/ dag tshur sheg/ chen po stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ chen po stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do//
234a2('bum): de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ don dam pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
234a3('bum): med do// de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid des

234a5('bum): stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
234a6('bum): la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/
234a7('bum): de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bdems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom
234b1('bum): shig/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te//

234b3('bum): de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma
234b4('bum): byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgoms
234b5('bum): shig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de la snyad pa gang yang med de// de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid
234b6('bum): stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma
234b7('bum): byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur shig/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgoms
235a1('bum): shig/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa
235a2('bum): nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
235a3('bum): snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

235a5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du dran
235a6('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems
235a7('bum): su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ yang dag par spong ba rnams snyoms
235b1('bum): shig/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can
235b2('bum): dag tshur sheg/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgoms shig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du dbang
235b3('bum): po rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dbang po rnams sgoms shig/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med
235b4('bum): do// de bzhin du stobs rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ stobs rnams sgoms shig/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
235b5('bum): snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur shegabyang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgoms shig/ byang chub kyi
235b6('bum): yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'dems te/ sems can dag
235b7('bum): tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
236a1('bum): med do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

236a3('bum): kye sems can dag tshur gsheg/ bsam gtan rnams sgoms shig/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin
236a4('bum): du tshad med pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tshad med pa rnams sgoms shig/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
236a5('bum): snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bdems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
236a6('bum): rnams sgoms shig/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams la/
236a7('bum): 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgoms shig/ rnam par de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med
236b1('bum): do// de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
236b2('bum): sgoms shig/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sku
236b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa snyoms
236b4('bum): shig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang med do// de bzhin du mngon
236b5('bum): par shes pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgoms shig/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/
236b6('bum): de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis
236b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
237a1('bum): sgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
237a2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyoms bcu sgoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gis
237a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
237a4('bum): sgoms shig/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdems te/
237a5('bum): kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du snying rje chen po la
237a6('bum): bdems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ snying rje chen po sgoms shig/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin
237a7('bum): du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgoms shig/ sangs kyi chos ma
237b1('bum): 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag
237b2('bum): tshur sheg/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin
237b3('bum): du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
237b4('bum): bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyir mi
237b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la

237b7('bum): de bzhin du rang byang chub la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang byang chub skabs shig/ rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying pa
238a1('bum): gang yang med do// de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
238a2('bum): sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dems te//
238a3('bum): kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
238a4('bum): med do// zhes de de ltar sems can rnams la 'dems te/ rjes su ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod kyang / gang la mngon par zhen pa med do// /
238a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la stong pa nyid kyi phyir gang gis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// /
238a6('bum): bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// /
238a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang mi gnas te/ de gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha
238b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas
238b2('bum): so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi gnas so// de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni
238b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhag pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang
238b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa ni bsam gtan
238b6('bum): gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhag pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
238b7('bum): de bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis
239a1('bum): stong ngo // gang la mnyam par gzhag po de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang
239a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bsam gtan gyi
239a3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
239a4('bum): de byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byams pa ni byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par
239a5('bum): gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de snying rje chen po la snyoms par 'jug
239a6('bum): kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje ni snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
239a7('bum): rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
239b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar dga' ba ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam
239b2('bum): pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar btang snyoms ni btang
239b3('bum): snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin
239b4('bum): gyis stong ngo // de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni/
239b5('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag
239b6('bum): pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
239b7('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
240a1('bum): rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par
240a2('bum): 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par
240a3('bum): gzhag pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de 'du shes med 'du shes med min
240a4('bum): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
240a5('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis
240a6('bum): stong ngo // de rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams
240a7('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyi
240b1('bum): stong ngo // de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas
240b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin
240b3('bum): gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la
240b4('bum): mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog
240b5('bum): pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de yang dag par spong ba bzhi la snyoms par
240b6('bum): 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam
240b7('bum): par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
241a1('bum): bzhi la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
241a2('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin
241a3('bum): gyis stong ste/ de la dbang po lnga la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la mi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // /
241a4('bum): gang mnyam par gzhag pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de la stobs lnga la
