274b2('bum): na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta
274b3('bum): re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems
274b4('bum): g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag
274b5('bum): cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
274b6('bum): ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/
274b7('bum): shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song
275a1('bum): gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi ga skabs kyang mi dbye'o//
275a2('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi bla la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa
275a3('bum): la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor
275a4('bum): te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston cing / khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur
275a5('bum): pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos
275a6('bum): ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /
275a7('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
275b1('bum): mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran
275b2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi
275b3('bum): yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam
275b4('bum): gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/
275b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam
275b6('bum): sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas
275b7('bum): kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de// de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
276a1('bum): sbyin pa byin cig/ 'phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/
276a2('bum): de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ 'phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos ste/ ngan
276a3('bum): song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul
276a4('bum): khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni
276a5('bum): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/
276a6('bum): gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston
276a7('bum): to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems
276b1('bum): 'khrug par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol/
276b2('bum): song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa
276b3('bum): can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag
276b4('bum): gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
276b5('bum): yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skab
276b6('bum): kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems
276b7('bum): g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
277a1('bum): de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i
277a2('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
277a3('bum): du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/
277a4('bum): gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab
277a5('bum): 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de
277a6('bum): dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par
277a7('bum): 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la
277b1('bum): sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon
277b2('bum): par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
277b3('bum): phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub byang gi
277b4('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/
277b5('bum): bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/
277b6('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med
277b7('bum): pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/
278a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so
278a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/
278a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa
278a4('bum): byin cig/ 'phongs pas ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag
278a5('bum): cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ 'phongs pas zil gyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos ste/ ngan song gsum las mi thar gyur ta re zhes ston to//
278a6('bum): sems can tshul khrims ngan pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pa ni bdag gi don
278a7('bum): kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
278b1('bum): yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems
278b2('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
278b3('bum): skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/
278b4('bum): de bas ni khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas
278b5('bum): yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo//
278b6('bum): can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta
278b7('bum): ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsu
279a1('bum): du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems
279a2('bum): bga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
279a3('bum): chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
279a4('bum): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos
279a5('bum): kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes
279a6('bum): rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag
279a7('bum): gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
279b1('bum): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyes 'gyod pa can du/
279b2('bum): gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang skyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor
279b3('bum): ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyar ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la
279b4('bum): sbyor te nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// khyed chos gang la mngon par
279b5('bum): zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen pa med do zhes ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang
279b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed
279b7('bum): pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa nyid kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis stong
280a1('bum): zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/
280a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/
280a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa 'am smon pa med pa 'am
280a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
280a5('bum): sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par
280a6('bum): rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs
280a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa
280b1('bum): byin cig/ 'phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag
280b2('bum): cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ 'phongs pas ni zil gyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur
280b3('bum): ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/
280b4('bum): tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/
280b5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci
280b6('bum): smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can
280b7('bum): phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug par
281a1('bum): gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar
281a2('bum): skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
281a3('bum): mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal
281a4('bum): ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos/ kyis/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas so//
281a5('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le
281a6('bum): lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
281a7('bum): chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
281b1('bum): sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir khyed
281b2('bum): kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can ji snyed
281b3('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa can ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/
281b4('bum): gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
281b5('bum): de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa
281b6('bum): can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la rten
281b7('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa'i spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor to/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs
282a1('bum): rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor te/ de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i
282a2('bum): chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// /
282a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can
282a4('bum): rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// // bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// /
282a5('bum): de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa
282a6('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par
282a7('bum): spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
282b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams
282b2('bum): sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
282b3('bum): rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
282b4('bum): pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi
282b5('bum): don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ 'phongs pa ni
282b6('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis
282b7('bum): shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ 'phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos ste/ ngan song gsum las mi thar gyur ta re chos ston to// sems
283a1('bum): can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/
283a2('bum): tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song
283a3('bum): gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir
283a4('bum): khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gyi gnod sems
283a5('bum): su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang
283a6('bum): yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin
283a7('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos
283b1('bum): ston to// sems can la po can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi
283b2('bum): nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar
283b3('bum): khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
283b4('bum): mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems
283b5('bum): g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gong sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin
283b6('bum): te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems bka' tsam
283b7('bum): gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
284a1('bum): kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa can ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan
284a2('bum): gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin
284a3('bum): te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod
284a4('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de
284a5('bum): dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs
284a6('bum): rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag pa 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo
284a7('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes bya bar chos ston
284b1('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems
284b2('bum): can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par/ sems can rnams
284b3('bum): lnga chos bstan par mi nus te/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams lam du gzud par mi nus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya 'dab ma med pa
284b4('bum): ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma rten par sems
284b5('bum): can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon/
284b6('bum): par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dag gis sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do//
284b7('bum): des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed pa de skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ste/
285a1('bum): de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas shing /
285a2('bum): de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/
285a3('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
285a4('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi/
285a5('bum): sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus
285a6('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//
285a7('bum): des lha'i mig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar
285b1('bum): mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/
285b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags
285b3('bum): pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
285b4('bum): mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi
285b5('bum): sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
285b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i
285b7('bum): gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can
286a1('bum): gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems
286a2('bum): kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
286a3('bum): gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs
286a4('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag
286a5('bum): tu song zhing sems can de dag gis sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i ga
286a6('bum): 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du
286a7('bum): chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes
286b1('bum): pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin
286b2('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/
286b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
286b4('bum): mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed pa de skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems
286b5('bum): kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
286b6('bum): gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
286b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing
287a1('bum): sems can de dag gis sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/
287a2('bum): bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i
287a3('bum): gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de
287a4('bum): dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin
287a5('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/
287a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ de shar phyogs kyi
287a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rnabs nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin
287b1('bum): nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi
287b2('bum): gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/
287b3('bum): 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston
287b4('bum): pa// de dag lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du 'dzin te// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te//
287b5('bum): sbyin pa'i gtam bam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/
287b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
287b7('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan de/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams
288a1('bum): la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
288a2('bum): gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
288a3('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin
288a4('bum): nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam
288a5('bum): 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de byang shar gyi phyogs
288a6('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas
288a7('bum): kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod
288b1('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam
288b2('bum): gyi bar du chos ston to// de shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de
288b3('bum): dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam
288b4('bum): bam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags
288b5('bum): pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar gyi chos ston to// de lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs
288b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan to// thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin
288b7('bum): nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
289a1('bum): gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//
289a2('bum): de nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i
289a3('bum): rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul
289a4('bum): khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden
289a5('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
289a6('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan ste/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can
289a7('bum): rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/
289b1('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
289b2('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung
289b3('bum): nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/
289b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de sems can gyi rnam
289b5('bum): grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing / de dag la de bzhin du
289b6('bum): chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes
289b7('bum): rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/
290a1('bum): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di
290a2('bum): zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ de sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag
290a3('bum): pa nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam
290a4('bum): 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig
290a5('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom blangs rnams la snyen bkur byed do// snyen bkur byas nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
290a6('bum): kyi sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
290a7('bum): gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de zag pa med pa mngon tu bya
290b1('bum): ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa med pa mngon tu shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/
290b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i
290b3('bum): bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
290b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su bzung bar
290b5('bum): 'dod pa de dang / de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing / mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba de dag gis
290b6('bum): gos par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang / bde ba 'am sdug
290b7('bum): bsngal des gos par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing
291a1('bum): mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston
291a2('bum): kyang bde ba 'am sdug bsngal des 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
291a3('bum): de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur
291a4('bum): ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can rnams
291a5('bum): yongs su smin par ma byas par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
291a6('bum): lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
291a7('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa las gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
291b1('bum): batshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i yan lag deng ga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa'
291b2('bum): chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
291b3('bum): bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
291b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la yongs su rkang par bya'o//
291b5('bum): bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum pa de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam gyi yan
291b6('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/
291b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag gis tshul khrims srung ngo // 'di'i don tu tshul khrims srung ngo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rdul khrims kyi pha
292a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas
292a2('bum): bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis
292a3('bum): bzod pa sgom mo// 'di'i don du bzod pa sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol
292a4('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing de brtson
292a5('bum): 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis brtson 'grus rtsam mo// 'di'i don tu brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes gsum po de dag
292a6('bum): pa mi rtog pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag gi 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
292a7('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi
292b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ 'di'i don tu bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go zhes gsum po de dag la mi
292b2('bum): rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol po 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa na
292b3('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab bo// bdag gis
292b4('bum): shes rab sgom mo// 'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
292b5('bum): zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog
292b6('bum): cing nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid sgom
292b7('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
293a1('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo
293a2('bum): bya/ nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog
293a3('bum): pa ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
293a4('bum): dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis
293a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
293a6('bum): sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa ni
293a7('bum): pa spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis stong pa zhing stong pa nyid
293b1('bum): rnam par bya'o// 'di'i don tu stong pa zhing stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum pa de dag la po rtog pa ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las rlob
293b2('bum): zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la mi rtog cing / chen
293b3('bum): po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu chen po stong pa
293b4('bum): nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge
293b5('bum): ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe//
293b6('bum): rnga ba nyi zung ba ning kyi phyir 'dzin don dam pa stod bzhed do// bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don dam pa stong pasnyed pa rnam pa zhes
293b7('bum): ma pa dadagapa man 'o// dzid sa pa dang pa zhi gang gis bdag cang / 'tsha ba sam thal ning gnan yang rnam pa 'dzin pam kyi na pa da
294a1('bum): chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing 'dus byas
294a2('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu
294a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
294a4('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing 'dus ma byas stong
294a5('bum): pa nyid la sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'dus
294a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
294a7('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi
294b1('bum): rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las
294b2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
294b3('bum): nyid bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
294b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma
294b5('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo
294b6('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang / 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
294b7('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dar
295a1('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dor ba med pa
295a2('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag
295a3('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang bzhin
295a4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin
295a5('bum): stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
295a6('bum): ba las sgro bla 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid la spyod
295a7('bum): kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
295b1('bum): 'di'i don tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo// 6zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dechos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
295b2('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi
295b3('bum): rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
295b4('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang
295b5('bum): 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mi dmigs
295b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bdag
295b7('bum): gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mi dmigs pa
296a1('bum): stong pa nying gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
296a2('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid
296a3('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dngos po med pa stong pa
296a4('bum): zhing bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
296a5('bum): ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog
296a6('bum): cing ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
296a7('bum): 'di'i don tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol
296b1('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi
296b2('bum): rtog cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po
296b3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dngos po med
296b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
296b5('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i
296b6('bum): tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dran pa zhe
296b7('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
297a1('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
297a2('bum): po dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni yang dag par
297a3('bum): spong ba rnams so// bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/
297a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
297a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
297a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom mo
297a7('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrolta bu 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa
297a8('bum): gzhani ya
297b1('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos so// dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing dbang po lnga bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
297b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dbang po rnams so// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog
297b3('bum): pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
297b4('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / stobs rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di
297b5('bum): dag ni stobs rnams so// bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu stobs rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ stobs gang
297b6('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
297b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi
298a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don
298a2('bum): tu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
298a3('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so//
298a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir 'di
298a5('bum): ngag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i lam
298a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing
298a7('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
298b1('bum): dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni
298b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo// zhes gsum
298b3('bum): po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
298b4('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing / bsam gtan
298b5('bum): rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i
298b6('bum): don tu bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gang gis bdag gis 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
298b7('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bzhi la
299a1('bum): spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams
299a2('bum): so// bdag gis tshad med pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu tshad med pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ tshad med pa gang gis kyang
299a3('bum): bdag 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
299a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
299a5('bum): bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
299a6('bum): pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
299a7('bum): par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
299b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos so// rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing rnam par thar pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
299b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo//
299b3('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
299b4('bum): chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
299b5('bum): dgu la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mthar gyis
299b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mthar gyis
299b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ gang gis bdag
300a1('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
300a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i choso// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod kyang / de la
300a3('bum): mi rtog cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
300a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom
300a5('bum): par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ rnam par
300a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi dge ba'i chos so//
300a7('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog
300b1('bum): cing mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// bdag gis mngon par shes
300b2('bum): pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag
300b3('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
300b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi
300b5('bum): phyir 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po dag la
300b6('bum): mi rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed
300b7('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing gzungs kyi sku
301a1('bum): rnams bsgom pa'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams
301a2('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
301a3('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
301a4('bum): chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di
301a5('bum): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
301a6('bum): bcu bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
301a7('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mi 'jig pa
301b1('bum): rnams la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams
301b2('bum): bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol/ bu 'di ni rtswa
301b3('bum): gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
301b4('bum): spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//
301b5('bum): bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag
301b6('bum): par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
301b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni
302a1('bum): @snying rje chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu snying rje chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi
302a2('bum): rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas zhe
302a3('bum): bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang / de la mi rtog cing sangs rgyas
302a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
302a5('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
302a6('bum): 'dres pa gang gis/ bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni/ byang chub
302a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar gyi byang chub sem
302b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ sems can tshad med pa de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
302b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor la/
302b3('bum): skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do//
302b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu dgu'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
302b5('bum): pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
302b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor
302b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi
303a1('bum): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
303a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin
303a3('bum): gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de
303a4('bum): yod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na zhugs pa yang gzhan la 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes mi bya'o//
303a5('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
303a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs
303a7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid
303b1('bum): kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig
303b2('bum): rten pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni mi'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni
303b3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa
303b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// zhes bgyi bar khyad par dang / rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmigs su
303b5('bum): ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ las ci ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang dmigs su ma mchis so//
303b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/
303b7('bum): las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan pa spyad pa 'am legs
304a1('bum): pa spyad pa 'am/ mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyi ngan song gsum du lhung ngo // legs
304a2('bum): par spyad pa'i las kyi lha dang mir skye'o// nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
304a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
304a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad// nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi
304a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ chen po stong pa nyid la sbyang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus ma
304a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin stong
304a7('bum): pa nyid pa spyad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/
304b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad/ rdzu 'phrul/
304b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad/ dbang po rnams la spyad/ stobs rnams le sbyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyad/
304b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad/ bsam gtan rnams la spyad/ tshad med pa rnams la spyad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/
304b4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med
304b5('bum): pa la spyad/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad//
304b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad/ snying rje chen po la spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad de/ nyams
304b7('bum): pa med pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed pa nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa mnyam par gzhag cing / bla na med pa
305a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi
305a2('bum): don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud ma zos shing / rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi ltung bar de ltar don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
305a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan
305a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am/ dkar po 'am/
305a5('bum): brnag pa 'am dkar ba 'am/ mi gnag mi dkar ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmig
305a6('bum): na sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lha dang mir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad
305a7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs par ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ phyir mi 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ dgra bcom pa
305b1('bum): ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
305b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar sems can 'di dag chos rnams
305b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar
305b4('bum): chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
305b5('bum): chub tu mi 'jug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams
305b6('bum): nas mi 'grol ste/ rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes la/ mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bar de'i phyir
305b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas de dag las/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na med pa
306a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/
306a2('bum): de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin par chos rnams la yod par rtags shing sems can 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma
306a3('bum): yin na/ de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin par chos rnams la yod par rtags shing sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ 'du
306a4('bum): shes med pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du byed med pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ mig med pa la mig tu 'du shes/
306a5('bum): rna ba med pa la rna bar 'du shes/ sna med pa la snar 'du shes/ lce med pa la lcer 'du shes/ lus med pa la lus su shes/ yid med pa la yid du 'du shes/ gzugs
306a6('bum): med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra med pa la sgrar 'du shes/ dri med pa la drir 'du shes/ ro med pa la ror 'du shes/ reg med pa la reg tu 'du shes/ chos med pa la
306a7('bum): chos su 'du shes/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa la mig gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ snga
306b1('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa la sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lce'i rnam par shes pa lA lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa la lus kyi rnam par shes
306b2('bum): bar 'du shes/ yid kyi rnam pa shes pa med pa la yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du she/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa lnga mig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
306b3('bum): med pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/
306b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
306b5('bum): gyis tshor ba med pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du
306b6('bum): shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lce'i 'du te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la lce'i 'dus te
306b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid kyi 'odu te reg pa'i
307a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes// sa'i khams med pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams
307a2('bum): med pa la chu'i khams su 'du shes/ me'i khams med pa la me'i khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams med pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams med pa la nam
307a3('bum): mkha'i khams su 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa la rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes/ ma rig pa med pa la ma rig par 'du shes/ 'du byed med pa la
307a4('bum): 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ ming dang gzugs med pa la ming dang gzugs su 'du shes/ skye mched drug med pa la skye
307a5('bum): mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa med pa la reg par 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ sred pa med pa la sred par 'du shes/ len pa med pa la len par
307a6('bum): 'du shes/ srid pa med pa la srid par 'du shes/ skye ba med pa la skye bar 'du shes/ rga shi med pa la rga shir 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos
307a7('bum): su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i
307b1('bum): chos su 'du shes/ zag pa med pa'i chos med pa la zag pa med pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'dus byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas
