341a7('bum): pa nyid kyang bzung du med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bzung du med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
341b1('bum): nyid kyang bzung du med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
341b2('bum): nyid kyang bzung du med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bzung du med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
341b3('bum): rnams kyang bzung du med do// dbang po rnams kyang bzung du med do// stobs rnams kyang bzung du med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang bzung du
341b4('bum): med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'ang bzung du med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// bsam gtan rnams kyang bzung
341b5('bum): du med do// tshad med pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang bzung du med
341b6('bum): do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bzung du
341b7('bum): med do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bzung du med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bzung du med do// de bzhin gshes
342a1('bum): ga pa'i stobs rnams kyang bzung du med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bzung du med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bzung du med do//
342a2('bum): snying rje chen po yang bzung du med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bzung du med do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung
342a3('bum): du med par shes par byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don tu gnyer to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung du med cing dngos po
342a4('bum): med pa ste/ rmi las lta bu sgra dran lta bu mig yor lta bu/ sdig rgyu lta bu sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes ma mthong mi gtogs par
342a5('bum): bzung du med pa'i chos kyis bzung du med pa'i chos gang yang thob par mi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na
342a6('bum): med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang cigatong yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu
342a7('bum): gtong ngo // tshul khrims ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu srung ngo // bzod pa gang ci bsgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsgom mo// brtson 'grus gang
342b1('bum): ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du brtsom mo// bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don tu mnyam par gzhog go/ shes
342b2('bum): rab gang ci bsgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsgom mo// bdag gi don tu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams
342b3('bum): kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang sems can
342b4('bum): med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog med pa srog gi 'du shes gnas pa dang / 'gro ba
342b5('bum): med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / skyes bu med pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang
342b6('bum): zag med pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can med pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag med pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su
342b7('bum): gnas pa dang / byed pa po med pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa blo lnga byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong ba po med
343a1('bum): pa la spong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / spong du 'jug pa po med pa la spong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba med pa
343a2('bum): la tsher ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tsher du 'jug pa po med pa la tshor du 'jug pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa po med pa la shes pa po'i 'du
343a3('bum): shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po med pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grel de/ phyin ci log las rnam par grol
343a4('bum): zhing 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su 'god do// de la bkod nas rgyu ba de dag yongs su mi rgyu ste bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam/
343a5('bum): 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi 'du shes
343a6('bum): sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ spong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes
343a7('bum): sam/ tshor du 'dug pa po'i 'du shes sas/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'ad
343b1('bum): ba dang / spros pa de dag btang nas spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
343b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la
343b3('bum): rab tu 'god de de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi yod dam pa ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
343b4('bum): ba de 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
343b5('bum): stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig
343b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par
343b7('bum): sangs rgyas so// zhes bya ba mi dmigs ste/ gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste/
344a1('bum): gnas kyis thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan
344a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do// gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur
344a3('bum): ba med do// gang la gnyis kyang de la mi gnyis pa yang med pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o// 'di
344a4('bum): ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de spros pa med pa ni mnyam pa nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
344a5('bum): chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dngos po
344a6('bum): med pa dang / dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa dang yongs su brjod pa med pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid de chos mnyam rnyed pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// chos mnyam pa
344a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad rnam par 'das pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis
344b1('bum): pa 'am/ 'phags pa 'am chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de de bzhin
344b2('bum): gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/
344b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin
344b4('bum): gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la
344b5('bum): mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
344b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad
344b7('bum): kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang mi 'gyur na/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa
345a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang
345a2('bum): yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
345a3('bum): dpa' rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa
345a4('bum): nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do// de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa ni gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
345a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la ni so so'i skye ba'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//
345a6('bum): 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
345a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
345b1('bum): 'das de ste chos mnam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni
345b2('bum): dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
345b3('bum): rgyas so zhes bgyi ba rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
345b4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
345b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
345b6('bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams sam/
345b7('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
346a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /
346a2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang
346a3('bum): chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das
346a4('bum): ci'i slad du/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar
346a5('bum): 'gyur ba legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog
346a6('bum): kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin sngam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
346a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun
346b1('bum): dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /
346b2('bum): chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa ma lags/ mi ldan pa yang ma
346b3('bum): lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams
346b4('bum): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye zo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//
346b5('bum): 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par 'god
346b6('bum): par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam
346b7('bum): pa dkod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
347a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas la mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir/ chos rnams rnam par dgod
347a2('bum): bar mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nas/ byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ mi yod par
347a3('bum): mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod par mngon nam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha
347a4('bum): yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs lngan
347a5('bum): phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi
347a6('bum): lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad med snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par
347a7('bum): nanas mang ma na pa pa ba mapa/ dag rgyas kyi med par man pa/ tsha ba'i rgya ma par 'dod pa/ rdu 'i po dpa ya dag
347b1('bum): med che pa'i lha yod par mngon nam 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nas/ mi che ba'i ma yod par mngon nam/ mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shin tum thong
347b2('bum): ba'i lha long bar mngon nam/ gyanam spang ba'i sgra yod par mngon nam/ lag min gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nganam mkha' mtha' las bye mched kyi sgra yong bar mngon nas/
347b3('bum): rnam shes mtha'asas bye mched kyi smra yod par mngon nam/ zung bad med pa'i skye mched kyi su yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes ning 'du shes med min bye mched kyi
347b4('bum): yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
347b5('bum): sod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
347b6('bum): bsod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/ nang stong bapa nyid yod par mngon nam/ byi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi slong pa
347b7('bum): nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus
348a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/
348a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong
348a3('bum): pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon
348a4('bum): nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/
348a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/ stobs rnams yod par mngon
348a6('bum): nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon
348a7('bum): nam/ bsam gtan rnams yong bar mngon nam/ tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam
348b1('bum): par thar pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
348b2('bum): ba med pa yod par mngon nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/
348b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs song bar mngon nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nas/ byams pa chen po
348b4('bum): yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod par
348b5('bum): mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon
348b6('bum): mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yod pa mngon
348b7('bum): nam/ theg pa chen po yod pa mngon nam/ dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod pa mngon nam/
350a1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid
350a2('bum): yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
350a3('bum): sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
350a4('bum): rab 'byor de lta bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ba'i chos rnam par 'god pa mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//
350a5('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa'o// // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar
350a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba'i de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dang pa'i rjes
350a7('bum): su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin nyid du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags
350b1('bum): sam/ de bzhin du rgyad pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam zhing mi g.yo ba lags sam/
350b2('bum): de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyirari ma 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba lags sam/
350b3('bum): de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid las mi bya lags sam/
350b4('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos mnam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// dede
350b5('bum): bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o// chos mnyam pa nyid la mi 'da'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin
350b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin ning dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
350b7('bum): nying dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nying dang / chos spyod med pa zhing dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
351a1('bum): / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
351a2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang //
351a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
351a4('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
351a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
351a6('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
351a7('bum): zhing dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nying dang / chos kyi gnas zhing dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o//
351b1('bum): de nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /
351b2('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
351b3('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni dgra
351b4('bum): bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas
351b5('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de bzhin nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
351b6('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni/
351b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
352a1('bum): dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/
352a2('bum): las rnam par mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid
352a3('bum): dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang
352a4('bum): med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
352a5('bum): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi
352a6('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi
352a7('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nying / de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid//
352b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/
352b2('bum): gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang /
352b3('bum): sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam
352b4('bum): par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
352b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
352b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
352b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byu
353a1('bum): ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams
353a2('bum): cad dang / bsam gtan dang / chad meng pa dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims m+b+ha pa
353a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
353a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
353a5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang
353a6('bum): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par
353a7('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
353b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
353b2('bum): ba nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
353b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
353b4('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
353b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
353b6('bum): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
353b7('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gicag dang / gcig tu ma 'dra ba dang / gcig las
353b8('bum): rnam par thar ba rdo stong ni na mtshan mam med pa dang smor ba med
354a1('bum): sa / ma na du/ / na/ na
354a2('bum): 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dubyed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chom nyid kyang gzhan te/ mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos ming

354b7('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi tshe/
355a1('bum): zhid kyang gzhan/ lba ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

355b1('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

355b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos
355b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ de
356a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa

356a5('bum): gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnams rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
356a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad tha dad du bgyi ba lags/ chos rnams ni tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
356a7('bum): pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
356b1('bum): sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa

356b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang ji skad du de ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mnyam pa
357a1('bum): @ning gang yin pa de zhing so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nying dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnas pa

357a4('bum): rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs
357a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid
357a6('bum): gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos ning gang yin
357a7('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nid gang yin pa de ning stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/
357b1('bum): nas/ rnam par shes pa'i chos ni gang min pa de ni byung pazhi mayin nan/ mig gi chos ni dgang yin pa den rdo
357b2('bum): ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos zhing gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgo'i de bzhin ni dgang min
357b3('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzug

358a2('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
358a3('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid
358a4('bum): nga yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang
358a5('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
358a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
358a7('bum): nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
358b1('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos
358b2('bum): zhid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
358b3('bum): pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
358b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi
358b5('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid
358b6('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
358b7('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ning stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos
359a1('bum): zhid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin
359a2('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
359a3('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
359a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid
359a5('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang
359a6('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
359a7('bum): pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
359b1('bum): nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
359b2('bum): ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
359b3('bum): ba nyid ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de
359b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
359b5('bum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin/
359b6('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
359b7('bum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi
360a1('bum): chos thaM dgang yin pa dkri stong ba ngas brnyan pa/ yang dag par thong ba rnams kyi chos ning gang yin pa de da stong ba da ma yin na/
360a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobs
360a3('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i
360a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
360a5('bum): nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
360a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de zhing stong pa nyid
360a7('bum): ma yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
360b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma/
360b2('bum): yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
360b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
360b4('bum): yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
360b5('bum): yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de
360b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos
360b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin
361a1('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams
361a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig
361a3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
361a4('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid
361a5('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
361a6('bum): stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan
361a7('bum): nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam// mig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i mtshan nyid dam/
361b1('bum): lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i
361b2('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/
361b3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
361b4('bum): mtshan nyid dam// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid nyid/ lce'i 'dus
361b5('bum): te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
361b6('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan zhing ngam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i
361b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
362a1('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam// sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi
362a2('bum): khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam// ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed
362a3('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/
362a4('bum): tsher ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid ngam/ len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/
362a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/
362a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
362a7('bum): nying dam// nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
362b1('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus
362b2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba med pa
362b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
362b4('bum): nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po
362b5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
362b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid
362b7('bum): dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
363a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma
363a2('bum): nyid dam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
363a3('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshes
363a4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/
363a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/
363a6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
363a7('bum): dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba
363b1('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
363b2('bum): nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
363b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang / so so'i skye bo las gud na
363b4('bum): yang de med/ de la dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med/ chos kyi rjes su
363b5('bum): 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la 'ang brgyad pa med/ brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa med/ rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de med/
363b6('bum): de la 'ang lan cig phyir 'ong ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba las gud na'ang med/ de la'ang dgra
363b7('bum): bcom pa med/ dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na yang de med/ de la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
364a1('bum): med/ byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de med par rig par
364a2('bum): bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos de nyid nge 'dus bgyis pa pagasas pa/ 'dus pa bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
364a3('bum): 'dus byas kyang ma yin 'dus ma byis kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gus na yang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med/ 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmigasu
364a4('bum): med de/ rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan
364a5('bum): pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan tu med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa
364a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi don dam par na ma yin te/ don dam par lus kyi 'dus byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed med de/ lus kyi 'du byed
364a7('bum): dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam pa dmigs su med/ 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang
364b1('bum): yin pa de don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la byang chub
364b2('bum): sems dpa'i spyod pa yang med do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
364b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/
364b4('bum): de'i slad du chos gang la yang yang chos ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing / ci yang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang
364b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam las kyang mi g.yol sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang
364b6('bum): de ni mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras
364b7('bum): pa de bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la yang ci yang byed pa'ang med/ ci'ang mi byed pa'ang med pa de/ gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis
365a1('bum): stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / bdag gi 'du
365a2('bum): shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid
365a3('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'gro
365a4('bum): ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
365a5('bum): gso ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong
365a6('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
365a7('bum): pa dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes
365b1('bum): dang bral bar byed cing / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / byed pa po
365b2('bum): 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tsher ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid
365b3('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa
365b4('bum): dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // gzugs kyi
365b5('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
365b6('bum): tsher ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang
365b7('bum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
366a1('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid
366a2('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
366a3('bum): rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
366a4('bum): sna'i 'du shes phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel dang / lce'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
366a5('bum): ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi
366a6('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
366a7('bum): gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa
366b1('bum): nying kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dri'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel pa dang / rom
366b2('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / re'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg gi 'du
366b3('bum): shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chos kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
366b4('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
366b5('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis
366b6('bum): 'khor las 'grel pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
366b7('bum): las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
367a1('bum): 'grel pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa
367a2('bum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong
367a3('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'dus shes dang phral nas
367a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas
367a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong
367a6('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid
367a7('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas 'khor ba
367b1('bum): las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
367b2('bum): las 'grel pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du
367b3('bum): shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i
367b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
367b5('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
367b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
367b7('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du
368a1('bum): shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
368a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang 'phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
368a3('bum): sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang
368a4('bum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi
368a5('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
368a6('bum): ba dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par
368a7('bum): pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // ma rig pa'i
368b1('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /
368b2('bum): 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang
368b3('bum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid
368b4('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
368b5('bum): pa dang / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
368b6('bum): byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas
368b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / len pa'i 'du shes dang bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
369a1('bum): pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye ba
369a2('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rga shi'i 'du
369a3('bum): shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes
369a4('bum): dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa nyid yin na yang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su dgod pa yang de bzhin
369a5('bum): gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i stong pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes
369a6('bum): thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul pa/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam// gsol pa/
369a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de snyam lags so// sprul pa de gang stong pa zhing ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/ stong pa zhing gang lags pa dang /
369b1('bum): sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mi ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de gnyis ka yang / stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i skad
369b2('bum): du 'di ni stong pa nyid do// 'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / sprul pa gnyis ka yang
369b3('bum): stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/
369b4('bum): rnam par shes pa 'am/ sprul pa ma yin de lta bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa las
369b5('bum): kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
369b6('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden
369b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
370a1('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
370a2('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de dag gis 'bras bu gang gis/ gang zag
370a3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
370a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnams dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
370a5('bum): chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ pha la ni nyan thos kyi sprul pa'o// la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'o// la la ni/
370a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o// 'di ni las kyis sprul pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad
370a7('bum): ni sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi
370b1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs
370b2('bum): ba'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bskyed pa 'am/ bgag pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag
370b3('bum): thams cad ni sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang la
370b4('bum): skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi masas pa'i mya ngan las
370b5('bum): 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ gnyis su yang mi dmigs te/
370b6('bum): chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do// zhes bka' stsal pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur
370b7('bum): ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi
371a1('bum): ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
371a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
371a3('bum): ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
371a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur pa la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam// rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa'ang med/ dngos
371a5('bum): po med pa'ang med/ ngo bo nyid kyang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur
371a6('bum): re skan// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos nyid mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
371a7('bum): / bam po bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
371b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
371b2('bum): dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
371b3('bum): byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas ci nas cung zad kyang mi mthong ba dang / cung zad kyang nye bar
371b4('bum): mi mthong ba dang / cung zad kyang sgro btags pa med pa dang / cung zad kyang slu ba med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
371b5('bum): byams pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// mtshan ma med pa mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// chos thams
371b6('bum): cad ro gcig pa nyid du mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// chos thams cad so sor gtogs pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//
371b7('bum): chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// chos thams cad ma skyes pa mthong ba ni de bzhin
372a1('bum): gshegs pa mthong ba'o// 'gog pa mngon gsum du mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa mthong /
372a2('bum): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum pa rab
372a3('bum): tu zhi bar mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// zhi ba mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gnyis su med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
372a4('bum): mthong ba'o// sna tshogs pa mthong ba dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gnas med par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
372a5('bum): mthong ba'o// gzhi med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// kun gzhi ma skyes pa mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// bag lagal
372a6('bum): ba spangs pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// spros pa med pa'i ye shes mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o//
372a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
372b1('bum): ba'o// mi mnyam pa med pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mthong ba dang len pa med pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs/
372b2('bum): pa mthong ba'o// mchog dang rab mchog dang / dri ma med pa dang / dri ma dang bral ba dang / dag pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / shin tu dang ba'i dbyings mthong ba ni de
372b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// srid par 'byung ba'i dbyings yongs su chad par gyur pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang /
372b4('bum): skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho las rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// nam mkha'i ngos ltar dri ma med pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de
372b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// ma 'dres pa'i dbyings mthong ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// byams pa kun tu g.yo ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur/
372b6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur pa yin te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste/
372b7('bum): dper na/ yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la/ skyes bu'i mig gi dbang po la skyon med par gyur pa la la zhig gis/ rang gi bzhin ras kyi rnam pa gsal
373a1('bum): bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log par g.yo ba thams cad bral ba dang spros
373a2('bum): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad bral ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa gal te byang chub sems
373a3('bum): dpas gzugs stong pa nyid du kun tu mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
373a4('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du kun tu mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// gal te stong pa nyid la gzugs kun tu mthong na de bzhi
373a5('bum): gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes par kun tu mthong na//
373a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no//
373a7('bum): de bzhin du gal te tshor ba yang gzhan/ 'du shes kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// zhes mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
373b1('bum): ba ma yin no// gal te gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do zhes mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
373b2('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid ni stong pa nyid do zhes mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gzugs ni gzug
373b3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ yi ge gang gis gzugs so zhes brjod par byed pa'i yi ge de nyid kyang / yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin no// byams pa de bzhin
373b4('bum): du tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ yi ge gang gis rnam par shes pa'o zhes brjod
373b5('bum): par byed pa'i yi ge de nyid kyang / yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin no// byams pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni sgro btags pa'i mtshan nyid de shin tu stong pa
373b6('bum): nyid ni ma yin no// 'di ni slu ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin du sgro btags pa med cing slu ba med pa yin no// byams pa ngo bo nyid thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni stong pa nyid
373b7('bum): ces bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid do// brjod pa thams cad dang thal ba dang / tshig
374a1('bum): gi lam thams cad las 'das pa/ yi ge med pa btags pa med pa dang / gdags par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba/ mig gis mthong ba med
374a2('bum): pa/ rna bas thos pa med pa/ sna'i snam du med pa/ lce'i myang du med pa/ lus kyis reg tu med pa/ yid kyis shes par byar med pa/ rnam par gzhag pa rnams dang
374a3('bum): bral ba bstan pa las 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul 'das pa/ gos pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ yi ge med pa/ 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du gyur pa/ 'gro ba
374a4('bum): dam pa yang dag par ston pa/ lta bar rtogs pa thams cad rtsa nas 'byin pa/ 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa/ zhes pa thams cad sel bar byed
374a5('bum): pa/ snang bar byed pa gsal bar byed pa/ kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa/ skye bo mkhas pa ma yin pa yang dag par
374a6('bum): sad par byed pa/ mthong ba ni stong pa nyid mthong ba ste/ byams pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
374a7('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// byams gang gis stong pa nyid yang dag par mthong ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang gis
374b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang ci nas kyang sems can med pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag med/
374b2('bum): pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / shed can med pa dang / shed bdag med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang chad pa med pa dang / nga'i med pa dang / ji lta
374b3('bum): ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ gang de ltar mthong ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te gzugs la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
374b4('bum): spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//
374b5('bum): gal te sa'i khams la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkhan
374b6('bum): khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab
374b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
375a1('bum): @#pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal zhe gzugs ni bdag gi zhes byung
375a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bdag go zhes spyod pa ni/
375a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te sa'i khams ni bdag go/ zhes spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du
375a4('bum): gal te chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni bdag go zhes spyod na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//
375a5('bum): gal te mig ni bdag go zhes spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag go zhes
375a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod pa ma yin no// gal te bdeg ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// zhes spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
375a7('bum): spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
375b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// zhes spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gang shes
375b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs
375b3('bum): pa mthong bar 'dod pa na chos gnyis po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la kun bston par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de
375b4('bum): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do// byams pa de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas chos 'di la bsnyen par bya ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan
375b5('bum): ma med pas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu spong ba la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yang /
375b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par rtog pa rnams gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa rnam
375b7('bum): par rtog pa rnams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i
376a1('bum): bus smras pa/ byams pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
376a2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / byams pa mig gi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gang la
376a3('bum): byung byams pa gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gzugs ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang
376a4('bum): don dam par med pa'i gzugs de ni rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo rnams 'drid par byed pa yin na de la so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams gzugs kyi
376a5('bum): 'du shes nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro// des de ltar gzugs su mngon par brtags nas gzugs la brten te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// mig gi rnam
376a6('bum): par shes pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen tu gyur te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pas nye bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na/ de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang
376a7('bum): mi ldan pa rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di ltar bzang ba nyid dang / gzugs nyid dang / kha dog nyid dang / rgyas pa nyid du nye bar rtog par byed do// de de ltar rnam
376b1('bum): par rtog pas rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir dang / yid kyi
376b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag par mi shes pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa rnams ni/ gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de thams cad stong
376b3('bum): pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byams pa de yang dper na sgyu ma mkhan
376b4('bum): gyi skyes bu mkhas pa 'am/ sgyu mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas/ sgyu ma'i las kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung
376b5('bum): gi tshogs rnams nye bar bstan par 'gyur la/ de la skyes bu'i mkhas pa la la zhig gis bltas pa dang / nges par dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas nye
376b6('bum): bar brtags par gyur cing des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin nye bar dmigs pa na stong pa nyid yin par ston par byed cing gsog nyid du ston
376b7('bum): pa dang / gsob nyid du ston pa dang / snying po med pa nyid du ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa
377a1('bum): / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs gang dang gang nye bar snang bar gyur pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // gsog
377a2('bum): nyid du mthong ngo gsob nyid du mthong ngo // snying po med pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de ni yang dag par ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di
377a3('bum): lta ste dper na gzha tshon nam dri za'i grong khyer lta na sdug pa nye bar 'phags par mthong bar gyur pa dag la skyes bu la la zhig gis mthong ba dang / nye bar dmigs pa dang /
377a4('bum): tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur la/ des de mthong ba dang nges par dmigs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur
377a5('bum): ba na/ stong pa nyid du ston par byed pa dang / gsog nyid du ston par byed pa dang / gsob nyid du ston pa dang / snying po med pa nyid du ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
377a6('bum): de ltar na yang gzugs de yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa kun tu byung ba'i 'du shes yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir ro// de de ltar gzugs la mkha
377a7('bum): pa dang / 'du shes la mkhas pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang
377b1('bum): nag nog med pa dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / byis pa rnams kyi sdom pa la yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'phags pa'i sdom pa rnams kyi rjes su yang dag par
377b2('bum): 'jug pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba dang / gnas med par gyur pa yin no// de ltar tshul khrims yongs su
377b3('bum): dag pa de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing nub pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang yongs
377b4('bum): su gardugs pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems rang nyid kyi dbang du gyur gyi/ sems dbang du mi 'gyur ro// de ltar sems la dbang thob par de'i sems
377b5('bum): gang dang gang skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad byang chub la gzhol ba dang / byang chub la 'bab pa dang / byang chub la bab par gyur pa dang / mchog dang khyad
377b6('bum): bar du 'phags pa dang / rgya che ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa dang / rgyud gcig tu gyur pa dang /
377b7('bum): yid la byed pa gcig dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa yin zhing de 'dug pa dam/ sdod pa 'am/ 'chag pa 'am/ nyal bar gyur pa
378a1('bum): na/ yid la byed pa gzhan med par de'i sems de 'ab ba med par don gyi bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par 'phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams
378a2('bum): pa 'di lta ste dper na skye ba'i dus la bab par gyur cing / dus de dang nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang 'bad pa med par mngal gyi sgor nye bar 'phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /
378a3('bum): mngal gyi sgo nas nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang chos nyid de so sor dmigs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'brang
378a4('bum): pa med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par 'phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la 'chi ba'i dus la bab par gyur cing dus de
