378a5('bum): dang nye bar gnas par gyur pa na 'bad pa med par srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / 'gag pa'i rgyun dang rjes su mthun pa dang / 'gag pa'i
378a6('bum): rgyun la gzhol ba dang / 'gag pa'i rgyun la 'bab par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bab pa med pa don gyi bya ba thams
378a7('bum): cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par 'phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las can rnams
378b1('bum): ni 'bang pa med par lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bad pa med par don gyi bya ba thams cad kyis/
378b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par 'phyogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar sems bskyed kyang mngon par mi shes par skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa de las 'byung bar mi 'gyur
378b3('bum): ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par gyis 'byed de/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems
378b4('bum): dpa' shes rab kyi stobs yin no// gang sems can yang nye bar mi dmigs/ 'khor ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad
378b5('bum): par ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par ni kun nas spyod pa gnyis mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
378b6('bum): stobs so// kun tu spyod pa gnyis mthong bas ma gos pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa 'di ni byang chub sems
378b7('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de la re ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yongs su spong ba ni byang
379a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i she rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul khrims kyi sdom pa/
379a2('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byams pa sems de dang tha mi dad pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// khro ba med pa nyid ni byang chub
379a3('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab stobs so// byams pa'i sems kyis rjes su 'jug pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// brtson 'grus kyi 'dra ba nyid na
379a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yid yongs su skyo ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
379a5('bum): bar 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// shes
379a6('bum): rab bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can gyi dang srog nye bar mi dmigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
379a7('bum): zhi ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can la ltos pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de bzhin
379b1('bum): gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi sku yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
379b2('bum): khyad par ro// sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa nyid du yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ni
379b3('bum): du ston pa ni byang chub dra ba'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthu sna tshogs pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas
379b4('bum): kyi mthu gcig pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas
379b5('bum): nyon mongs pa med par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med par ston pa ni/ byang
379b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna
379b7('bum): tshogs smon pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yang dag par len pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes
380a1('bum): rab kyi stobs so// zab mo'i spyod pa yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems
380a2('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// srid pa tham pa'i nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i
380a3('bum): 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas te/ mngon par byang chub pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar
380a4('bum): yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bdud kyi las yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bdud
380a5('bum): thams cad tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor ba nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab
380a6('bum): kyi stobs so// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// mya ngan las 'das pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
380a7('bum): shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
380b1('bum): sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la so sor rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de rnams yang dag pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
380b2('bum): khyad par ro// zhi ba'i tshul mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mi bzad pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems
380b3('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// lam der rab tu
380b4('bum): shes par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul gcig mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sna
380b5('bum): tshogs kyi tshul ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyon mongs pa nye bar mi dmigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so
380b6('bum): nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po rab tu shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don dam pa mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
380b7('bum): rab kyi stobs so// tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs gsal bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tshul gcig
381a1('bum): tu yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa nyid du ston pa nyid ni byang chub sems
381a2('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa chen po la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa ni
381a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snying rje chen po la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la bde bar
381a4('bum): 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rtag tu zhi ba rnam par
381a5('bum): 'phel ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// btang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can gyi bya ba
381a6('bum): rnams la skyo ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes kyi khyad par ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
381a7('bum): stobs so// gdul bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon par
381b1('bum): 'dus byas pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mos pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni byang chub sems
381b2('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bsam pa dang bag la
381b3('bum): nyal ba sna tshogs par ston par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs pa mngon par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
381b4('bum): shes rab kyi stobs so// sgra skad sna tshogs la mngon par mos pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro//
381b5('bum): spobs pa sna tshogs pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
381b6('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dus su smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// don yod par chos ston par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
381b7('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yang dag par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
382a1('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de nas lha'i bu la la zhig 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du 'dus par gyur pa de yang / yang dag par ma yin par smra ba
382a2('bum): nyid kyi sgrar smra ba nyid la rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i
382a3('bum): rgyur gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rkyen du gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa de zhing btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub
382a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi khyad par btags pa 'di ci zhig yin snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yun ring mo ma lon pa
382a5('bum): zhig na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag khyed rnams kyis
382a6('bum): ji ltar rjes su bsams pa dang / rnam par rtog par byed pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos
382a7('bum): gang yang dag par ma yin pa de brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo rnams 'drid par byed de mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur
382b1('bum): ba'i chos can yin pas na/ de'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pas zhes bshad de/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par gyis/ sred pa la spyod pa'i sems
382b2('bum): can rnams la nye bar ston par byed pa/ sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i chu bor nub po// 'khor ba'i btson ra la mngon par dga' ba/ phyin ci log bzhis byin ci
382b3('bum): log tu gyur pa/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang mngon par ldan 'jig tshogs la lta ba la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs pa/ blo tha dad par gyur pa/ snyigs ma lngas
382b4('bum): snyigs par gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa/ sems rnam par myos pa/ sems rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la bde
382b5('bum): ba med pa/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ 'dus byas kyi bde ba rnams thos nas/ dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin la/ dge ba'i chos la
382b6('bum): mngon par gzhol ba de rnams sdom pa la rnam par dag par gyur pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid thob nas/ de'i 'og tu 'dus byas kyi bde ba las bslang ste/ 'dus ma byas
382b7('bum): kyi bde ba la 'jog par byed do// lha'i bu rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'das ni yang dag pa ma yin pa smra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhes smras pa
383a1('bum): yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
383a2('bum): bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad pa la yang khyed spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa
383a3('bum): dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa sbyin pa ni byang chub sems
383a4('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la re ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub sems
383a5('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// dge gi sdom pa sbyin pa dang bcas pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don spyod pa ni byang chub sems
383a6('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don mthun pa ni byang chub sems
383a7('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ris mthun pa'i gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i she rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub kyi
383b1('bum): phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
383b2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar sems dpa' nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa de ltar bslab pa la kun tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
383b3('bum): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis non pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab de nyid
383b4('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur pa yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni chos thams cad yongs su bsdu ba shes pa yin no// bstan pa 'di
383b5('bum): bstan pa ni lha'i bu lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgya phrag mang po ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba'i rnam
383b6('bum): par dag par gyur to// lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyes so// lha'i bu bye ba dpag tu med pas lha'i
383b7('bum): bu'i me tog man da ra ba dang man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das dang gnas gtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
384a1('bum): @gtor ba mngon par gtor bar gyur to// mngon par gtang bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gser gyi mdog can las/ na bza' ba shus te
384a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la chos kyi dgab par skul to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
384a3('bum): de logs su thal mo sbyar bar btud nas/ na bza' de yang dag par mnos te blangs nas spyi bor bzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gang de bzhin gshegs
384a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten
384a5('bum): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can las na bza' ba shus te/ chos kyi mchog dang rjes su mthun pa'i brtsal ba ni rnyed pa legs par
384a6('bum): rnyed do// sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur pa de rnams ni/ lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur par shes par bya'o// yid la re ba yongs su
384a7('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / theg pa chen po la nges par zhugs shing / tshogs yang dag par bsags par
384b1('bum): gyur pa dang / skye ba de dang de yongs su rdzogs pa na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba legs par bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyu la nges par 'jug par
384b2('bum): 'gyur ba yin na/ gang 'dzin par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / lung nod par byed pa dang / ston par byed pa dang / kha don byed pa dang /
384b3('bum): yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
384b4('bum): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed
384b5('bum): pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa
384b6('bum): ti'i bu dkon mchog gsum po ni 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
384b7('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger
385a1('bum): 'dri ba dang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed pa de ni dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ mi khom pa rnams su skye bar mi
385a2('bum): 'gyur ro// ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa rnams par mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na de 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin
385a3('bum): gshegs pa byams pa'i zhabs drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing der skyes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing / chos kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga' ba'i
385a4('bum): lus kyi dga' ba mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de de nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du dad pa dang ldan zhing yang dag par 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar
385a5('bum): 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa las chos ston pa thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ 'di yang
385a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i phan yon yin par shes par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu dri ma med par bkod pa zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du gyur nas/ 'dug
385a7('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bkur stir bgyid pa
385b1('bum): dang bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / brjed par bgyid pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me
385b2('bum): dang / dri dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa'i rigs
385b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dug gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ mes 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ chus 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro//
385b4('bum): mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur/ brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / gzhon nu'i gdon gyis bzung ste/ 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du
385b5('bum): na dbang po bde bar gnas pa dang / tshig 'khrul pa med pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// des 'chi ba'i dus bgyid
385b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i sprul pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin
385b7('bum): no de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
386a1('bum): bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
386a2('bum): yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa de la bdag gis stobs dang / mthu dang / rnyed pa sgrub par bgyid pa dang / srung ba dang /
386a3('bum): bskyab pa dang / yang dag par sba bar bgyi'o// mi ma yin pa rnams kyang de la bsrung ba byed pa nyid du 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / dol mi ma yin pa rnams bsnyen
386a4('bum): bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi las yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / de la gcan zan drug pa can rnams mche bar bgyi bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'thab
386a5('bum): ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par smra ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnyid log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ba dang / skrag cing 'jigs pa
386a6('bum): med par rmi lam mthong ba dang / de'i nyin mo dang mtshan mo bde bas 'da' bar byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa gang yod pa de thams cad mthong ba'i chos la yongs su zad
386a7('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / de la mgo'i nad dam/ mig gi nad dam/ rtsib log gi nad dam/ glo ba'i nad dam/ rlung gi nad dam/ mkhris pa'i nad dam/ bad kan gyi nang
386b1('bum): dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa'am yul gzhan du 'gro ba'am/ mchi ma 'dzag pa 'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa 'am/
386b2('bum): sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i nyes pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ chos
386b3('bum): smra ba gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa dang / yang dag par bzung ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i chos smra ba de la bla ma'i 'du shes
386b4('bum): bskyed par bgyi'o// sbyin gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par
386b5('bum): bya'o// de nas chos smra ba de'i yon tan rjes su bsgrag par bya ba dang / bstod pa'i tshig bsgrag par bya ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bar bya bar
386b6('bum): 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na chos smra ba ni 'jig rten long ba rnams la mig ster bar byed par 'gyur ba yin no// chos smra ba mchod pas ni de bzhin gshegs
386b7('bum): pa rnams mchod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa legs so legs so// tshig 'di legs par smras so// de bzhin du tshe dang
387a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bshad pa legs so// legs so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/
387a2('bum): byams pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // bam po bcu dgu pa'o// /
387a3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshel
387a4('bum): 'dod pas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du da ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra
387a5('bum): dbyangs mi zad pa sgrogs pa'i drung na/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o//
387a6('bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
387a7('bum): chen po rtag tu du sngon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshor ba na ji ltar yongs su btsal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
387b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol ba na/
387b2('bum): lus don du mi gnyer ba dang / srog la ltos pa med pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dag la mi gnas pa de ltar yongs su btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
387b3('bum): yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang las sgra 'di lta bu thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
387b4('bum): phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa
387b5('bum): mi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa med pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi
387b6('bum): bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song shig/ rigs kyi bu nang ngam/ phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par mi byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon du
387b7('bum): ma lta bar song shig/ lho phyogs su ma yin/ nub phyogs su ma yin/ byang phyogs su ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og du ma yin/ phyogs 'tshams su yang ma lta
388a1('bum): bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang 'jig tshogs las ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos par bya'o// tshor
388a2('bum): las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las yang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa 'di ni rnam
388a3('bum): par nyams par 'gyur ro// ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las
388a4('bum): nyams par gyur pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod cing / rjes su thob par mi 'gyur ro//
388a5('bum): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rtag tu dus sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag
388a6('bum): ni sems can thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
388a7('bum): cad bsdu zhing sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras
388b1('bum): so// rigs kyi bu rtag tu du legs so// legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul sgras bos te 'di skad ces
388b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la mos pa skyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
388b3('bum): btsal bar bya'o// da kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya'o// sems can du blta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod
388b4('bum): kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa
388b5('bum): dang / dngos po med pa dang ma 'gags pa dang chos rnams ston par byed pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bskur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod
388b6('bum): kyis de ltar bsgrubs nas ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thob par 'gyur
388b7('bum): rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa na de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa
389a1('bum): tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
389a2('bum): bdag gis thos par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
389a3('bum): rgyas rnams dang nye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// ngal
389a4('bum): ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba rnams la ston pa yin par 'du she
389a5('bum): bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis chos smra ba
389a6('bum): la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ bdud sdig can na
389a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang sbyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar
389b1('bum): bsten par byed pa de dag khyed kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su 'grogs pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen par gyis shig ces zer ba yang yod
389b2('bum): de rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa skyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis ni thabs la mkhas pa de mi shes so//
389b3('bum): 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bsten cing 'grogs te bsten par bya'o// de nas byang chub sem
389b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyi skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag par tshul so sor brtag par bya'o//
389b5('bum): rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
389b6('bum): zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / sgyu
389b7('bum): ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / zag chag lta bu dang / mig g.yor lta bu yin no// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba
390a1('bum): phyi bzhin 'brang na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
390a2('bum): bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems pa dang /
390a3('bum): yi rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir 'gyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid yongs su mi skyo bas dge
390a4('bum): slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di
390a5('bum): blangs nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid du 'gro ba bya dang / su
390a6('bum): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam nas/ des sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing mya ngan byed pa dang smre sngags 'don bzhin du 'dug go
390a7('bum): de nas phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar byed do// de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun gyi bar gyi nyin mo 'am
390b1('bum): mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur par du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la
390b2('bum): byed pa mi bskyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ nyin mor yid la byed pa mi
390b3('bum): bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu cig sdug pa 'chi ba'i dus
390b4('bum): byas pa sdug bsngal ba ste/ yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu cig pu yid la byed pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa
390b5('bum): gzhan gang yang ma 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu
390b6('bum): byin pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shar phyogs su 'gro ba 'di nye ba 'am/ ring ba ni ci tsam su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma
390b7('bum): gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i
391a1('bum): mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs zhig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyed tshig de skad smras pa ni legs so
391a2('bum): legs so// ji ltar khyed kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon
391a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sbyang ba spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyed kyi brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di
391a4('bum): dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs de nyid du song shig dang rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spos dang ldan
391a5('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shang ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongs
391a6('bum): su bskor ba/ tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/
391a7('bum): grong bar gyi srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs dang khri nyam nga ba med par/ bar bar du zam par btags pa/
391b1('bum): grong khyer kho ra khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing / bskor ba la rin po che sna bdun gyi rab de dag gi mda' yab rnams 'dzam bu'i chu
391b2('bum): bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing tog gi 'bra
391b3('bum): bu chags pa/ 'da' yab las skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i thag gu byung ba/ 'da' yab gcig shos gzhan dang 'brel pa/ grong khyer thams cad gser
391b4('bum): gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khyebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kar de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste dper na/
391b5('bum): yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam zhing sman la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu
391b6('bum): g.yer ka de dag la/ rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer
391b7('bum): de'i 'khor yug tu chu 'bab pas gang zhing legs par 'bab pa/ chu ha cang yang mi grang zhing / ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod de/ chu de la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
392a1('bum): zin pa las thub pa rin po che ma tshogs kyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can gzhugs nas kyi zhing dga' la yongs su spyod ngo // chu dag
392a2('bum): thams cad kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis khyabs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim pa/ ngang dang ldan pa
392a3('bum): gzhan dag gis khebs te/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs la den med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i
392a4('bum): nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun la byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re
392a5('bum): la yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor lug tu thams cad dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud pa la dang /
392a6('bum): ku mu ta dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dang / rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog ud pa la dang /
392a7('bum): ta dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu gang du shing rta'i 'phang po tsam ste/ sngon po kha dge sngon po// sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon pa
392b1('bum): 'byung ba ser po/ kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser por byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po// dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba
392b2('bum): dkar po kha dog dkar po// dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad la ngad pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / bya
392b3('bum): ka rang ta dang / gzhad dang shang shang de'u sgra 'byin pa dag yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag dadag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing / ris rus bcad pa med de/
392b4('bum): 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la lhag par mos pa'i sems can dag ni sngon gyi
392b5('bum): rnam par smin pa las grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi bzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che
392b6('bum): sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis
392b7('bum): yongs su skor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral
393a1('bum): zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod do// skyed mos de re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba
393a2('bum): dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang // dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang
393a3('bum): nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas pa'o// ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas pa'o// /
393a4('bum): ngos gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas pa'o// des bzhi pa ni shel las byas pa'o// nang gi sa gzhi ni ke kai ru las byas pa la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/
393a5('bum): rdzing bu de dag re re na yang them smras rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa brgyan pa skas kyi rim pas mdzes par byas pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams
393a6('bum): cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi them skas thams cad las kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad
393a7('bum): chu ni me tog ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khyebs shing ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / gzhad rnams skad 'byin to//
393b1('bum): rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu kun nas me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes la me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung na/
393b2('bum): rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi chur dri phyogs shing / kha dog dang ldan dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang
393b3('bum): bcas pa/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga'i myugur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /
393b4('bum): bud med gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam rdzing bu dag na/ rtag tu dga' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te rtse zhing dga' mgur
393b5('bum): yongs su spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/ dga' mgur spyod cing de na dus gsum du she
393b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'god pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
393b7('bum): chen po chos 'bogs kyi khri ga ser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / baiDUr+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting bstan nang tshangs can bting
394a1('bum): ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags byed pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bA re mu tig
394a2('bum): gis brgyan pa bris shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs mngon par rtor cing / sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs
394a3('bum): dang / drug pa sna tshogs kyis shin du bdug par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
394a4('bum): pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
394a5('bum): byin pa nyan to// de na gang dgazhan pa'i lta bu dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags 'bum phrag mang po ches
394a6('bum): ba de dag la la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha don byed/ la la ni yi ger bri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des sems
394a7('bum): can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
394b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig/ de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi
394b2('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng
394b3('bum): stong pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
394b4('bum): btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyi ni mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par song shig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//
394b5('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshig de thos nas/ rga ba dang mgu ba dang yid rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
394b6('bum): par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gi zug rngus phog na yid la gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu
394b7('bum): 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang gang bdag la shes
394b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par byed cing / gang chos de thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong bar
395a1('bum): pa bya bya/ 'gyur snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sa phyogs de/
395a2('bum): nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa nyams su myong ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
395a3('bum): nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi mi shes pa dang bral ba
395a4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam pa tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
395a5('bum): chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel
395a6('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog kram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
395a7('bum): bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i
395b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
395b2('bum): can thams cad sgyu ma la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhe
395b3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral
395b4('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
395b5('bum): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya
395b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge
395b7('bum): 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes
396a1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad mo bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
396a2('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad mo bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi
396a3('bum): rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang
396a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsha
396a5('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba
396a6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags
396a7('bum): pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes
396b1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa
396b2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin
396b3('bum): gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
396b4('bum): rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab
396b5('bum): tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyi
396b6('bum): bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de 'di bzhin du btsal te/ de yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzin de
396b7('bum): ngag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas te rtogs pa ni/ gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/ gang bla na
397a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
397a2('bum): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis
397a3('bum): 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang /
397a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu
397a5('bum): byin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba dang / mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu
397a6('bum): de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di dag nyid la rab tu don tu gnyer ba dang / mdun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / mdun pa
397a7('bum): la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs
397b1('bum): par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
397b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol to//
397b3('bum): bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags// de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
397b4('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
397b5('bum): byin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs te/ rigs kyi bu de ni khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyis/ des khyod la ji ltar bsgo ba
397b6('bum): bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la skal pa 'am/ bskal pa gnyis saM
397b7('bum): bskal pa brgya 'am/ skal pa steng ngam/ de las lhag par 'gro la thod bzhin thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/
399a1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
399a2('bum): cad phul yang rigs kyi bu de la khyod kyis skad cig cig tsam gyi yang drin lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di
399a3('bum): lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
399a4('bum): gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs byung nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag la
399a5('bum): langs so// langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de bzhin
399a6('bum): gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
399a7('bum): 'phags ni gzungs rab tu thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par byas pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzin pa/ bdag gi
399b1('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin zhing yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song
399b2('bum): ste/ nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid 'dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub
399b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang gus par bya ba
399b4('bum): nye bar gzhag ste/ 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur bstir bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro
399b5('bum): bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag bkur bstir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor
399b6('bum): bu'am/ mu tig gam/ baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ sa le sbra ma 'am/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog 'phreng ngam/
399b7('bum): byug pa 'am/ bye ma 'am/ gdugs de dag kyang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/
400a1('bum): bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa mi skye'o snyam du sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
400a2('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu du de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla ma dag la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ mthar gyis shar phyogs su song ste/ grong khyer chen po shin
400a3('bum): tu yangs pa 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis yongs su gang ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong bar gyi dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/
400a4('bum): 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs te/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi
400a5('bum): lus stong zhig zad de btsongs dengs te/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
400a6('bum): bsngal dpag tu med pa myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin nonano// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
400a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod mi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du
400b1('bum): sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
400b2('bum): chos 'phags la kur stir byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
400b3('bum): chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing
400b4('bum): thos pa rgya mtsho yang thob par 'gyur la/ bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs kyi lha rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan thams
400b5('bum): cad kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der sems can mang po dag gi don
400b6('bum): byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed pa dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
400b7('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
401a1('bum): ci nas kyang bram pa dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mi su 'dzad// su zhig no bar

401a3('bum): ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs cig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bku
401a4('bum): bstir bya snyam na/ su lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/
401a5('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su btang ba lhag pa'i bsam pa phun
401a6('bum): sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul bdag gis gzhal bar bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i
401a7('bum): dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la ba der song ste/ byin nas byang
401b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing gdung la mchi ma phyung ba ci zhes/ des/
401b2('bum): smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod na lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas de la kho
401b3('bum): bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa
401b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u
401b5('bum): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la mis ni bya ba med kyi kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed do// /

401b7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang zho ba rnyed pa ni bdag gi
402a1('bum): rdzogs par gyur s+ho// rnam gyi sems dga' ba dang / sems bde dang / sems rab tu dgyu bar gyu nas/ rdzas de'i sa 'dren kyis rnam sa/
402a2('bum): zam po'i khye che ba'i sus 'dasas byed gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des del 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bakhyod ring kyi 'di ba sbyin ni nis byas pa dang/

402b1('bum): kyi bu de'i drung du song ste/ dri'o snyam nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la ba de song ste/ byin nas
402b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag

402b6('bum): rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bskur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyed la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so//
402b7('bum): bu mo rigs kyi bu gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bo de las bslabs

403b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub

406a1('bum): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag
