406a5('bum): gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag bzag pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// mi
406a6('bum): 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi khrag gzags pa
406a7('bum): 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / des bdag la 'di skad du mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
406b1('bum): da ni dbul te la nor gzhan ci yang med do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir
406b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bstir bya'o zhes mchi na/ bdag gis de la
406b3('bum): 'di skad du bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon gyi rnam pa 'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du bdag sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis
406b4('bum): mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi
406b5('bum): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di la spro bar bgyid
406b6('bum): pa ni shin du dga' ba bgyid pa'o// ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod pa
406b7('bum): ci'i phyir chos la mchod par mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
407a1('bum): bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la
407a2('bum): bkur stir bgyid pa'i nor mang po dag bdag gis sbyin no// bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la
407a3('bum): bder mchi'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa
407a4('bum): dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu
407a5('bum): de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags pa mchod par bgyi'o// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//
407a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa lags na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la
407a7('bum): khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro ba byed na/ khyed nged kyis gnang gis
407b1('bum): bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la blta zhing mchod par nged kyang 'gro'o// nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye
407b2('bum): zhig/ de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang bkur bstir bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces
407b3('bum): smras so// bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyi'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag
407b4('bum): kyang rgyan gyis brgyan te/ rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
407b5('bum): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag kyang thogs shing / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa
407b6('bum): dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang shing rta gcig
407b7('bum): tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyos
408a1('bum): / ga la ba de logs su dong ngo // der mthar rtsis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas grong
408a2('bum): khyer gyi spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis ra ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ rta babs bdun
408a3('bum): yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba dang / chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/
408a4('bum): 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du btams
408a5('bum): pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems
408a6('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis
408a7('bum): bltas te/ chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la
408b1('bum): byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
408b2('bum): chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba 'di ni bdag gis mi 'cha'o snyam nas/ shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang lhan cig tu
408b3('bum): shing rta las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor
408b4('bum): cing mdun du bdar te bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
408b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing
408b6('bum): mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gis sgron ma'i bya ba byed de
408b7('bum): gdug smos dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir e ka ru nag po 'ba'
409a1('bum): zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgom bzhi
409a2('bum): bzhag nas/ de'i nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam du bai DUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshog
409a3('bum): pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pa
409a4('bum): khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong zhing / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang /
409a5('bum): lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu batho
409a6('bum): bar mthong ngo // lha'i sil sman dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
409a7('bum): skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyed lha stong phrag du ma dag dang rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir/ me tog ma ma ta ra ba dang / tsan tan gyi phye ma
409b1('bum): dag 'thor zhing mngon par rab tu 'thor na/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang la ci'i phyir gdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin
409b2('bum): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems
409b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
409b4('bum): yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin par khyed
409b5('bum): shes sam de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes
409b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa de ni khang bu
409b7('bum): brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya ba zhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab
411a1('bum): nas bzhag ste/ kho bo chags gis khyed la bstan par sla ba ma yin gyi/ de nyid ston pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
411a2('bum): chen po rtag tu du tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs ste/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog phreng gi chun pa dang / gos rin po che dang
411a3('bum): gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / kos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi
411a4('bum): me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ste/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
411a5('bum): 'phags la kur stir bya ba'i phyir cha shas kyis bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang lhan cig tu me tog
411a6('bum): dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bad+mag la sogs pas/ dang por
411a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ste/ byin nas chos la mchod
411b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye
411b2('bum): ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis gtor/ mngon par gtor mngon
411b3('bum): par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu
411b4('bum): gyur to// gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang 'dra bar gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin
411b5('bum): gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub
411b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa
411b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di skar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthuche ste/ 'di skar gzi brjid che ba rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
412a1('bum): spyod pa na yang rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dun/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/
412a2('bum): ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga'
412a3('bum): babaskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i
412a4('bum): dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang byang chub sems dpa'
412a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang
412a6('bum): 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon gsum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ji ltar byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskur sti
412a7('bum): byed pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur bstir byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin
412b1('bum): du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la
412b2('bum): mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par
412b3('bum): shog shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
412b4('bum): la mchod pa byas shing / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
412b5('bum): chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes dang bcas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
412b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di na
412b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
413a1('bum): phyin pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gi sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs gang la ba de logs su mchis te 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag
413a2('bum): gis sgra de las ci srid cig tu 'gro bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi zhing shin tu
413a3('bum): gdung bar gyur te sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi gzhan du na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
413a4('bum): pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ci srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris
413a5('bum): so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ 'di skad ces gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad
413a6('bum): lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong
413a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar bdams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs
413b1('bum): lu zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes ste dper na dge slong bsam
413b2('bum): gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin no// bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de las ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol
413b3('bum): tu phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa na de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom
413b4('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs byung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa 'di las
413b5('bum): skyes pa yin no// 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la legs
413b6('bum): par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin
413b7('bum): gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni sngon gyi
414a1('bum): rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de bzhin
414a2('bum): gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro// snyam nas rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs
414a3('bum): pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhun/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzud pa 'tshal
414a4('bum): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhed pa bdag la bshad du gsol/
414a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//
414a6('bum): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces
414a7('bum): smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
414b1('bum): de ni bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba yang dag pa'i
414b2('bum): mtha' la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid
414b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs
414b4('bum): kyi bu 'dod dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro
414b5('bum): ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni
414b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med do// rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag ni de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
414b7('bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/
415a1('bum): 'di lta ste med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi mas bdungs pas sos
415a2('bum): ka'i zla ba tha ma nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig sgyu g.yo ba mthong nas der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang
415a3('bum): nas 'ongs gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ gang du song / rtag
415a4('bum): tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig sgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu nyi mas bdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/
415a5('bum): shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smig sgyu mthong bas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes pa bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags
415a6('bum): kyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni
415a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin
415b1('bum): can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes brjod par bya'o// dper na mi de nu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshes
415b2('bum): pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
415b3('bum): rnams la byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i
415b4('bum): tshogs sam/ dpung pu chung gi tshogs sam/ de la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang byon pa dang bzhud pa med do// /
415b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig mthong ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/
415b6('bum): bcu 'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshes
415b7('bum): pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de bzhin gshegs pa dag gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus
416a1('bum): @rdzus pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lum la chos gang yang thub pa mi dza // dril ma ni brdzun te yang dag pa ma lags te/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/
416a2('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos
416a3('bum): thams cad rmi lam smra bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed pa de/ de chos nyid mi
416a4('bum): shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par gtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byin pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag
416a5('bum): thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug tu song ba dang / dong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rgyang ring du gyur te/ de dag
416a6('bum): thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang yang chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rmi la/
416a7('bum): lta bu'o// zhes yang dag pa ji blta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag
416b1('bum): chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang dag de bzhin gshegs
416b2('bum): ba'i chos nyid du shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par mi rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na
416b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos de dag ni/
416b4('bum): yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che
416b5('bum): ngag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang steng dang / 'og dang phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod
416b6('bum): kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi rgyu dang
416b7('bum): rkyen dang gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ rten nas byung ngo // rin po che dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mi 'pho med kyi/ rkyen de dag
417a1('bum): yodon don pa cing dag rab ta 'byed do// rkyen de dag med na rin pa che de dag rab tu 'byed par yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu /
417a2('bum): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas
417a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi spyod pas yongs su grub pa yin pas rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par
417a4('bum): smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu
417a5('bum): 'di lta ste dper na pi wang gi d+hA byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ rten nas byung ba/ rgyu la ga las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa'o//
417a6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na po zang gi khrig pa la brten/ lpags pa la brten/ rgyal rten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud brten la brten nas/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las ten/
417a7('bum): nas pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/ de sang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / lpags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las me byung / rgyud rten las /
417b1('bum): byung mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sbra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de dag 'gag pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du rigs
417b2('bum): kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig
417b3('bum): gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs
417b4('bum): pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshegs pa med kyang gang du yang mi bzhud do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /
417b5('bum): bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis de bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gsheg
417b6('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol
417b7('bum): tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang bzhud ba med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yos pa chen po g.yos
418a1('bum): par gyur to// gong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam badrug pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos rab tu gsos/ kun tu gsog kun tu rab tu
418a2('bum): gsos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang bkrogs shing sba bkong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
418a3('bum): kyi rtsa dang / shing dang gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur
418a4('bum): to dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab po// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub
418a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi
418a6('bum): bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig rten la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan
418a7('bum): pa thos so zhes zer ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras
418b1('bum): ga na pa ca byung gas na shA/ sa kyis spru pa/ nga sa
418b2('bum): bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par
418b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgres pa dang srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro//
418b4('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha
418b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can ji snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis
418b6('bum): rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par
418b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom mi za'o// bdag the tsom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang //
419a1('bum): de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun du 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkhar
419a2('bum): la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskur bstir bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub
419a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag byin te/
419a4('bum): 'di skad du rigs kyi me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskur bsti gyis shig/ 'di ni khyed yongs su bzung ba
419a5('bum): yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyed spro bar byed/
419a6('bum): de/ de lta bu bskal pa dpag tu med pa spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dga'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
419a7('bum): chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon
419b1('bum): par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gis lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig
419b2('bum): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng slad cad khyod kyis rim gro dang / zham bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo// des bdag gi lus
419b3('bum): phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tsheng dpon gyi bu mo dang 'khor lnga brgya
419b4('bum): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyis//
419b5('bum): bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos 'di dag thob par gyur cig khyod nyid kyis dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
419b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la bskur bstir bgyis pa dang / de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus
419b7('bum): tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed cag kho bo la lhag pa'i bsas pas gnas par byed na kho bo la
420a1('bum): lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag byin cig dang / bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo // bu mo dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa na
420a2('bum): khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod par bya bar bdag nyid dbul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
420a3('bum): rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang rgyan gyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems
420a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul lo// rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor lnga brgya po 'di dag dang / shing rta lde brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su yongs
420a5('bum): spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems
420a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
420a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs pa/
420b1('bum): mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
420b2('bum): pan 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
420b3('bum): thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo las sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya
420b4('bum): dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs
420b5('bum): nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu dul slar byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang
420b6('bum): nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/
420b7('bum): 'dug pa'am/ zhal bar byed pa ni mi 'chal/ 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston tu/
421a1('bum): phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba 'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems
421a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
421a3('bum): grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
421a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /
421a5('bum): ro la rkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur snyam bdag cag kyang byang chub sems
421a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs
421a7('bum): 'di chag chag legs par btab pa dang / legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor to// sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
421b1('bum): po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi
421b2('bum): bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da'
421b3('bum): bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos pa/ byang chub sems
421b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las langs nas/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur
421b5('bum): ro// zhes grag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang /
421b6('bum): rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags te chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad
421b7('bum): kyis sbas pa bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de bstan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug
422a1('bum): nas chos ston par 'gyur bar bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sa phyogs de chag chag bta
422a2('bum): bar 'dod na bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga'
422a3('bum): zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi
422a4('bum): snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus
422a5('bum): phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung nas/ byang chub sems
422a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus phyog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig
422a7('bum): pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir ram/ 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma
422b1('bum): rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis/
422b2('bum): sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu chag chag btab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
422b3('bum): sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/
422b4('bum): gang de dag la sdung sdig can dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba la glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo
422b5('bum): de dag gi sems gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar chos
422b6('bum): 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na
422b7('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
424a1('bum): nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag tu med pa las sems can rnams thar par bya ba'o snyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to// snyam du sems so//
424a2('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te lha'i tsan gyi dri chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas/
424a3('bum): sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di
424a4('bum): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab po// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na
424a5('bum): med do// rigs kyi sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson
424a6('bum): 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
424a7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag
424b1('bum): bdar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na bdag gis me tog dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag/
424b2('bum): chos 'chod pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
424b3('bum): chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man da ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis/ sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig/
424b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces des/ de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba
424b5('bum): khal stong byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der bkram pa byas
424b6('bum): so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
424b7('bum): chos 'phags po bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang la yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor
425a1('bum): 'bum 'phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems
425a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gta
425a3('bum): dang po la sgoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
425a4('bum): 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnam pa nid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos
425a5('bum): thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa ni bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
425a6('bum): ba gso ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad
425a7('bum): khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
425b1('bum): pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/
425b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid
425b3('bum): ngo// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu
425b4('bum): med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
425b5('bum): tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
425b6('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab
425b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
426a1('bum): pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam
426a2('bum): pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do//
426a3('bum): chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid
426a4('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa
426a5('bum): med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang
426a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// chos
426a7('bum): thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya
426b1('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
426b2('bum): thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya/
426b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya
426b4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang /
426b5('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams
426b6('bum): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes
426b7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
427a1('bum): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad dbye ba med pa zhes bya
427a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
427a3('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
427a4('bum): phrag brgya pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o//
427a5('bum): / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin
427a6('bum): gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang
427a7('bum): steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi'i klung gi bye ma
427b1('bum): snyed dag na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / ye
427b2('bum): ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa
427b3('bum): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab
427b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang / ldan par gyur te/ gang skyes pa thams
427b5('bum): cad du yang sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du yang gang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur pa/ de
427b6('bum): dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam du yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ dal ba phun sum
427b7('bum): tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ thams
428a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
428a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
428a3('bum): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par yongs su bzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ tshangs
428a4('bum): shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub
428a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ mnyan par bya'o// bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya/ 'don par bya/ lung nod
428a6('bum): par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha don du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing / rab tu gsal ba legs
428a7('bum): par bris te/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug du mar
428b1('bum): me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bskur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i
428b2('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/
428b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
428b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga'o de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad do//
428b5('bum): kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim
428b6('bum): grer byas so// bskur bstir byas so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sku 'di las khyod kyis phangs pa dang /
428b7('bum): dad pa dang / gus pa byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas kyang //
429a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar/ khyod la lan
429a2('bum): gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do// rjes su gtad do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/
429a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par
429a4('bum): bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
429a5('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang // ston pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / yi ger
429a6('bum): 'bri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
429a7('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu/ mar mo'i 'breng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bskur
429b1('bum): bstir byed/ tha mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ garjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i/ sems can de dag ni/
429b2('bum): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang /
429b3('bum): ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o/
429b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa la sogs
429b5('bum): ba dang / de tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
429b6('bum): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das
429b7('bum): kyis gsungs pa la// mngon par bstod do//
430a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/
430a2('bum): yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// /
430a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas
430a4('bum): ba'i/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa//
430a5('bum): oM ni da~M d+ha e tsha ba tim hA shra ma Na/ oM su pra te/ ba dz+ra les hA/ bkra shes/ dge'o/
